DOC.detailed_description: Uterus transplantation perform live donor patient absolute uterine factor infertility . Organ procurement donor perform laparotomy . Transplantation also perform laparotomy . Embryo transfer do 10-12 month transplantation . After birth 1-3 child uterus remove hysterectomy .
DOC.criteria: age 40 year absolute uterine factor infertility BMI < 30 systemic disease psychiatric disease
